Home » 12S2 Nidānavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 3 Dhātusaṃyutta » 3.4 Catutthavagga
3.4.9 Dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta
Dhātusaṃyutta
Catutthavagga
Dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta
122.
818Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. “Catasso imā, bhikkhave, dhātuyo. Katamā catasso? Pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu, vāyodhātu. Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti…pe…  (vitthāretabbaṃ) pajānanti…pe…  sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
819Navamaṃ.
